sentences.en: Calcareous clay soils have high limestone content that neutralizes natural acidity of the soil.
sentences.cn: 石灰质的粘土内有含有能中和土壤自然酸性的石灰石.

sentences.en: Calcareous likes sun and fertile soil, resistance to early fear of floods.
sentences.cn: 性喜阳光和石灰性肥沃土壤, 耐早怕涝.

sentences.en: Calcareous sediments accumulated on a sea floor and eventually were compacted and cemented to form limestone.
sentences.cn: 钙质沉积物堆积在海底,最后压紧并胶结形成石灰岩.

sentences.en: Calcite cementation seens a possibility where lime grains or calcareous organisms are abundant.
sentences.cn: 在灰质颗粒或钙质生物丰富的地方,方解石胶结作用似乎是有可能的.

sentences.en: Colonization of a calcareous stripmine spoil by earthworms promoted incorporation of organic matter.
sentences.cn: 在石灰质露天矿引入蚯蚓,则促进有机物的结合.

sentences.en: If critters were able to control pH at their calcification sites by buffering the acid in the surrounding water, as the calcareous green algae did, they also fared better.
sentences.cn: 如果这些海洋生物象富含钙质的绿藻那样，能够通过缓解周围水中的酸性来控制钙化部位的pH值，它们也可能会应对得更好一些。

sentences.en: In calcareous soil, drought is the key factor influencing the potassium content of tobacco leaves.
sentences.cn: 在石灰性土壤上, 干旱是提高烟叶含钾量的障碍因子.

sentences.en: Other plankton species in near equal numbers replaced calcareous microplankton as they died out.
sentences.cn: 钙质微体浮游生物消亡时,已经有近乎等量的其它浮游生物种类代替它们了.

sentences.en: Plants from the high - lime plots grew better on calcareous soil.
sentences.cn: 高石灰小区的植株在石灰质土上生成较好.

sentences.en: Rendzina A type of brown earth soil typical of humid to semi - arid grasslands over calcareous rocks.
sentences.cn: 一种褐色的土壤,其特征为潮湿的半干旱的草地上覆盖着石灰质的岩石.

sentences.en: Results: The total 38 cases had not produced subcutaneous tissue necrosis or calcareous deposition.
sentences.cn: 结果: 38例早产儿静脉补钙均未发生皮下组织的坏死与钙化灶.

sentences.en: The calcareous white stones of the river Piave constitute this land.
sentences.cn: 皮亚韦河钙质的白色石头构成了这片土地。

sentences.en: The desorption kinetics of phosphorus calcareous soil in China.
sentences.cn: 与磷在土壤中的解吸动力学>>相似的文献.

sentences.en: The more recent calcareous, or calcium carbonate, deposits that make up the tufa formations are closer to the bottom and lighter in color.
sentences.cn: 钙质或碳酸钙越近现代，所构成凝灰岩地层的沉积物越靠近底部，颜色也比较浅。

sentences.en: The soil, a calcareous sandy loam, pH 8.4 ( H _ 2 O ) was collected from Avon, South Australia.
sentences.cn: 取样土壤为灰质砂壤土, pH8.4 ( H2O ), 位于南澳大利亚的埃文.

sentences.en: Through calcareous milkiness liquid deposition, optimum reaction conditions were selected.
sentences.cn: 通过采用灰乳沉淀法,选取最佳反应条件.

sentences.en: When the mood is agitated, eats rich calcareous archery target food suitably.
sentences.cn: 当心情烦躁时, 宜多吃富含钙质的食物.

sentences.en: Wine and horses have always played a prominent role , as the red, calcareous soils favour both.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒和骏马一直有着非常突出的联系, 红色石灰质土壤尤其适合它们.

trans.tran_en: of, containing, or resembling calcium carbonate; chalky
